text: Mythimna is a genus of moths in the family Noctuidae described by Ferdinand Ochsenheimer in 1816. ==Species== * Mythimna abdita Hreblay & Yoshimatsu, 1998 * Mythimna accurata Philpott, 1917 * Mythimna acontosema Turner, 1903 * Mythimna adultera Schaus, 1894 * Mythimna aenictopa D.
